title: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Forgets the file type
description: The icon has also changed from the parent java file icon to a generic file icon.
OB: When saving a file using SaveAs, the file is saved without a file extension and the icon is changed to a generic file icon.
EB: The file should be saved with the same extension as the original file, unless explicitly changed. The icon should remain the same as the original java file icon.
SR:
1) Open an existing java file
2) Make modifications to the file
3) Click on the SaveAs icon, located next to the Save icon
4) A dialog box will appear
5) Browse for a valid location to save the file
6) Enter the filename without specifying the extension (as it is not requested)
7) Click Ok

Expected result: The file is saved with the same extension as the original file and the icon remains unchanged.
